solution_line_template: Jaydee can type his research paper in {total_words}/{words_per_minute} = <<{total_words}/{words_per_minute}={minutes_to_type}>>{minutes_to_type} minutes.
Since there are {minutes_per_hour} minutes in an hour, he can finish it in {minutes_to_type}/{minutes_per_hour} = <<{minutes_to_type}/{minutes_per_hour}={hours_to_finish}>>{hours_to_finish} hours.
